name: BETTER SOLUTIONS FOR HEALTHCARE
description: An advocacy organization dedicated to addressing the rising costs of healthcare.
sampleDescriptions: Promote hospital competition, enforce federal price transparency laws for hospital charges, rein in hospital price markups, and ensure honest billing practices by hospitals.
